      public Map<Integer,Group> find(HashMap<String,String> searchParams, int offset, int limit) throws SQLException
      Find operation. Queries table and returns records found. Null parameters will return all records.
      Overrides:
      find in class Table_Access<Group>
      Parameters:
      searchParams - a HashMap<String, String> of key, value pairs representing the query column and search value. This method automatically adds Type=Group
      limit - the maximum records to return
      offset - the first record to return
      Returns:
      a Map<Integer, T> where key is the record ID, and value is the record
